subject: Medicine
title: Targeted Therapy
description: Learn Targeted Therapy in one minute.

hook.text: Traditional chemo kills all fast-growing cells. Targeted therapy hits only cancer cells with specific mutations.

buildup.text: Targeted drugs are designed to attack specific molecular changes that drive cancer growth.

discovery.text: Imatinib transformed chronic myeloid leukemia from fatal to manageable by targeting one specific protein.

twist.text: Cancer cells can develop resistance to targeted drugsâ€”mutating to bypass the blocked pathway.

climax.text: Combination therapies targeting multiple pathways simultaneously make resistance harder to develop.

punchline.text: Precision beats brute force in fighting cancer.

quiz.question: How did imatinib change the treatment of chronic myeloid leukemia?
options: It targeted one specific protein, making the disease manageable
It completely cured all patients within one month
It replaced all other cancer treatments worldwide
